tool_description: Generates detailed concept specifications for game assets including visual style, technical requirements, and design constraints.

asset_type.description: Type of asset to conceptualize: character, environment, prop, vehicle, weapon, ui_element

art_style.description: Visual art style: realistic, stylized, cartoon, pixel_art, low_poly, photorealistic

target_platform.description: Target gaming platform: pc, mobile, console, vr, web

poly_budget.description: Maximum polygon count for the asset (100-50000)

theme_tags.description: Thematic tags to guide concept generation

error_messages: Invalid asset type: Use one of [character, environment, prop, vehicle, weapon, ui_element]
Invalid art style: Use one of [realistic, stylized, cartoon, pixel_art, low_poly, photorealistic]
Invalid platform: Use one of [pc, mobile, console, vr, web]
Polygon budget out of range: Must be between 100 and 50000
usage: Specify asset_type and art_style as minimum requirements. Add target_platform, poly_budget, and theme_tags to refine the concept. The tool generates comprehensive specifications for asset creation.

concept_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated concept

description.description: Detailed textual description of the asset concept

technical_specs.description: Array of technical requirements and constraints

color_palette.description: Recommended color codes in hex format

style_notes.description: Specific styling guidelines and artistic direction
